function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in built environments due to close proximity of individuals","Impact":"Risk of spreading diseases such as flu, common cold, or other contagious illnesses","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, and promoting personal hygiene practices","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C sanitation systems, touchless fixtures, and biometric access control systems","People":"Individuals working or living in built environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, employers, and homeowners"}]}
